EmailTemplate.description: TFS Contact Us - Web-to-Case - Terms of Use Auto-response
EmailTemplate.name: TFS: Contact Us - Terms of Use (Unauthenticated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Toyota Financial Services - Contact Us Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName}:
Thank you for contacting Toyota Financial Services via the 'Contact Us' link at www.ToyotaFinancial.com. Messages sent through this channel are unsecure. As we value your privacy, we will not provide account-specific information through this unsecured channel.
For information about our Online Privacy Policy and Terms of Use, please scroll down to the bottom of the page at www.ToyotaFinancial.com. Then select 'Privacy Policy and Terms of Use' for more information.
Thank you for visiting us at www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Toyota Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
